name: Nothing you can do will change your mark
name_original: Nothing you can do will change your mark
description: You are a student stuck in uncontrollable circumstances, and the people in charge of your education want to assign you a mark. Play minigames to maximize your raw score in each subject, and pray that your modified score will not be too far off from that. Play minigames in the subjects of Math, Science, Literature, Humanities, Music, and Foreign Languages, and learn the true meaning behind your marks.
